EmailTemplate.name: Manager Feedback For Requestor
EmailTemplate.subject: Manager Feedback:{!Managers_Feedback__c.Name}:{!Managers_Feedback__c.Subject__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience with the {!Managers_Feedback__c.Service_Area__c} process. Please know that {!Managers_Feedback__c.OwnerFullName} will personally be handling your comments. If you do not hear back from us within 5 business days, please feel free to contact {!Managers_Feedback__c.OwnerFullName} directly at {!Managers_Feedback__c.OwnerEmail} / {!Managers_Feedback__c.OwnerPhone} or Ed Berdick at BerdicE@sutterhealth.org
